pageContext.claim: “Remember, President Obama's famous line caught on the open mic, secretly telling the Russian president to quote, ‘Inform Vladimir that after my election I'll have more flexibility.’ Okay. Remember that? Remember that? Lot of people remember that, I remembered it. I saw it happen, I didn't like it. They don't bring it up. The fake news will never bring it up.”
pageContext.analysis: These 2012 comments caught on an open microphone, from Obama to Russia's Dmitry Medvedev, were widely reported at the time.
